ModMetaData.name: Absolute Legends Hair
ModMetaData.author: RE6AL
ModMetaData.description:
Mullets, and other kinds of legendary styles. Homeless people, New Kids Turbo, Rednecks, and other fashion icons are here.
After creating this hair pack i did cut my hair to mullet style. oh god thats the best feeling in the world. so right now i have the style called "Coolmullet" in this mod.
I personally find all this styles very handsome. Latest additions first appear on github version
